caption.p: Modulation of the inflammatory response by corticosteroids. Corticosteroids reduce IL-8, interleukin 8; MCP-1, monocyte chemoattractant protein 1; and IP-10, interferon-γ-inducible protein 10. Moreover, corticosteroids inhibit the ribonucleic acid responses of IL-6, interleukin 6; IFN-γ, interferon gamma (Th1 response), and IL-4, interleukin 4 (Th2 response).
